title: BitcoinWell
author: BitcoinWell
created_time: May 08, 2023, 05:54:43 PMLast edit: June 06, 2023, 07:42:33 PM by BitcoinWell
content: Upcoming Bitcoin Meetup Details:https://www.meetup.com/yegbitcoin/Join us for the monthly Edmonton Bitcoin meetup, hosted at the  Bitcoinwell.com  headquarters on Whyte Ave!This month, we will be kicking things off with a presentation on building and using bitcoin nodes starting at around 6:30 pm.In addition to the presentation, we will provide snacks and drinks for everyone to enjoy, and you'll have the chance to meet and connect with other bitcoin enthusiastsDon't miss out on this fun-filled and informative event!Similar bitcoin meetups are hosted every month. Please check the meetup.com link for details as the time and event location can change.
